sqlQuery.name: OrganismAlias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, project_id, source_id as old_source_id, project_id AS old_project_id FROM ApidbTuning.OrganismAttributes

sqlQuery.name: organismAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, project_id, oa.species, replace(replace(oa.species, '[', ''), ']', '') as species_display, oa.strain, decode(oa.is_reference_strain,0,'no',1,'yes') as is_reference_strain, oa.orthomcl_abbrev, oa.name_for_filenames, 'Data files' as download_link, organism_name, organism_name AS organism_full, oa.megabps, nullif(oa.ncbi_tax_id, 0) as ncbi_tax_id, nullif(oa.species_ncbi_tax_id, 0) as species_ncbi_tax_id, database_version, --oa.strain_abbrev as strain, oa.contigCount, oa.supercontigCount, oa.chromosomeCount, nullif(oa.genecount, 0) as genecount, oa.genecount as genecount_number, oa.pseudogenecount, oa.codinggenecount, oa.othergenecount, nullif(oa.arraygenecount,0) as arraygenecount, nullif(oa.ecnumbercount,0) as ecnumbercount, nullif(oa.popsetcount,0) as popsetcount, nullif(oa.rnaseqcount,0) as rnaseqcount, nullif(oa.snpcount, 0) as snpcount, nullif(oa.chipchipgenecount,0) as chipchipgenecount, nullif(oa.rtpcrcount,0) as rtpcrcount, nullif(oa.estcount,0) as estcount, nullif(oa.orthologcount, 0) as orthologcount, nullif(oa.gocount,0) as gocount, nullif(oa.tfbscount,0) as tfbscount, nullif(oa.proteomicscount,0) as proteomicscount, nullif(oa.communitycount,0) as communitycount, decode(oa.isOrganellar, 0, 'no','yes') as isOrganellar_flag, decode(oa.arraygenecount, 0, 'none','yes') as array_flag, decode(oa.chipchipgenecount, 0, 'none','yes') as chipchip_flag, decode(oa.rnaseqcount, 0, 'none','yes') as rnaseq_flag, decode(oa.estcount, 0, 'none','yes') as est_flag, decode(oa.snpcount, 0, 'none','yes') as snp_flag, decode(oa.ecnumbercount, 0, 'none','yes') as ec_flag, decode(oa.gocount, 0, 'none','yes') as go_flag, decode(oa.rtpcrcount, 0, 'none','yes') as rtpcr_flag, decode(oa.orthologcount, 0, 'none','yes') as ortholog_flag, decode(oa.communitycount, 0, 'none','yes') as community_flag, decode(oa.tfbscount, 0, 'none','yes') as tfbs_flag, decode(oa.hasHTSIsolate, 0, 'none','yes') as hasHTSIsolate_flag, decode(oa.hasPopset, 0, 'none','yes') as hasPopset_flag, decode(oa.proteomicscount, 0, 'none','yes') as proteomics_flag, oa.is_annotated_genome FROM apidbtuning.organismAttributes oa

sqlQuery.name: GenomeAnnotationVersion
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.source_id, oa.project_id, v.annotation_version, v.annotation_source from apidbtuning.organismattributes oa left join (select oa.source_id, oa.project_id,dsh.annotation_version,dsh.annotation_source from (select max(dsh.build_number) bld, dsh.dataset_presenter_id from apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh where dsh.annotation_version is not null group by dsh.dataset_presenter_id ) dpb, apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt, apidbtuning.organismattributes oa where dpb.bld = dsh.BUILD_NUMBER and dpb.dataset_presenter_id = dsh.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID and dsh.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id and dnt.name like oa.internal_abbrev || '\_primary_genome%' escape '\') v on oa.source_id = v.source_id and oa.project_id = v.project_id

sqlQuery.name: GenomeVersion
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.source_id, oa.project_id, v.genome_version,v.genome_source from apidbtuning.organismattributes oa left join (select oa.source_id, oa.project_id,dsh.genome_version,dsh.genome_source from (select max(dsh.build_number) bld, dsh.dataset_presenter_id from apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh where dsh.genome_version is not null group by dsh.dataset_presenter_id ) dpb, apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt, apidbtuning.organismattributes oa where dpb.bld = dsh.BUILD_NUMBER and dpb.dataset_presenter_id = dsh.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID and dsh.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id and dnt.name like oa.internal_abbrev || '\_primary_genome%' escape '\') v on oa.source_id = v.source_id and oa.project_id = v.project_id

sqlQuery.name: BuscoGenomeCounts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, busco_genome, lineage_dataset as busco_lineage_dataset FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes o, (WITH busco_data AS ( SELECT oa.source_id, sequence_type, lineage_dataset, to_char(c_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS c_per, to_char(s_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS s_per, to_char(d_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS d_per, to_char(f_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS f_per, to_char(m_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS m_per, ( c_score + f_score + m_score ) AS total FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, apidb.organism o, apidb.busco b WHERE b.organism_id = o.organism_id AND o.taxon_id = oa.component_taxon_id ) SELECT oa.source_id, lineage_dataset, 'C:' || b.c_per || '%[S:' || b.s_per || '%,D:' || b.d_per || '%],F:' || b.f_per || '%,M:' || b.m_per || '%,n:' || b.total AS busco_genome FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, busco_data b WHERE b.sequence_type = 'genome' AND b.source_id = oa.source_id ) busco WHERE o.source_id = busco.source_id (+)

sqlQuery.name: BuscoProteinCounts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, busco_protein FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes o, (WITH busco_data AS ( SELECT oa.source_id, sequence_type, to_char(c_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS c_per, to_char(s_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS s_per, to_char(d_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS d_per, to_char(f_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS f_per, to_char(m_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '90.9') AS m_per, ( c_score + f_score + m_score ) AS total FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, apidb.organism o, apidb.busco b WHERE b.organism_id = o.organism_id AND o.taxon_id = oa.component_taxon_id ) SELECT oa.source_id, 'C:' || b.c_per || '%[S:' || b.s_per || '%,D:' || b.d_per || '%],F:' || b.f_per || '%,M:' || b.m_per || '%,n:' || b.total AS busco_protein FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, busco_data b WHERE b.sequence_type = 'protein' AND b.source_id = oa.source_id ) busco WHERE o.source_id = busco.source_id (+)

sqlQuery.name: IsPublished
sqlQuery.sql:
SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, CASE WHEN (dp.dataset_presenter_id in (SELECT dataset_presenter_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetpublication WHERE pmid IS NOT NULL ) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_published , '' || dp.display_name || '
' as dataset_page FROM APIDBTUNING.datasetnametaxon dt, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dp WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dt.taxon_id AND dt.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dt.dataset_presenter_id = dp.dataset_presenter_id

sqlQuery.name: ReleasePolicy
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, p.release_policy FROM apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dt, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter p WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dt.taxon_id AND dt.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dt.dataset_presenter_id = p.dataset_presenter_id

sqlQuery.name: BuildFirstLast
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id,o.project_id, MIN(h.build_introduced) AS build_introduced, h.build_latest_update FROM apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dt, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, (select dataset_presenter_id, min(build_number) as build_introduced, max(build_number) as build_latest_update from apidbtuning.datasethistory group by dataset_presenter_id) h WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dt.taxon_id AND dt.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dt.dataset_presenter_id = h.dataset_presenter_id GROUP BY o.source_id, o.project_id, h.build_latest_update

SELECT o.source_id,o.project_id, MIN(h.build_introduced) AS build_introduced, h.build_latest_update FROM apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dt, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, (select dataset_presenter_id, min(build_number) as build_introduced, max(build_number) as build_latest_update from apidbtuning.datasethistory group by dataset_presenter_id) h WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dt.taxon_id AND dt.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dt.dataset_presenter_id = h.dataset_presenter_id AND ds.project_id = o.project_id GROUP BY o.source_id, o.project_id, h.build_latest_update

sqlQuery.name: IsApolloGenome
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT oa.source_id, oa.project_id, CASE WHEN (aid.apolloid IS NOT NULL) THEN 'Apollo' ELSE 'N/A' END AS is_in_apollo, CASE WHEN (aid.apolloid IS NOT NULL) THEN 'https://apollo.veupathdb.org/annotator/loadLink?organism='||aid.apolloid ELSE '@WEBAPP_BASE_URL@/static-content/faq.html#apollo10' END AS apolloidurl from apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, apidbtuning.ApolloID aid where oa.organism_name = aid.organism(+)
